author: swp0x0
content:
hi team, sorry if it is off-topic, pls guide me to the right channel if it is
I wanted to check what is the current proposer lookahead window?
I would assume it's 32 since proposers are chosen based on the stake, and the EB is updated after every epoch, but I have seen people quoting 64 as well.
If someone could point me in the right direction, that would be very helpful

author: potuz
content: You can only know your spot for the current epoch precisely for the reason you say. However, the mix in that determines the randomness is fixed two epochs in advance and in mainnet the balance changes are never drastic enough to get it wrong if you just compute proposers for the next epoch. Clients need to do the computation on the spot for safety though
